title: Data Validation Virtual Assistant
job_overview:
We are seeking a team of dedicated Virtual Assistants to support a time-sensitive project involving structured data processing tasks. This project does not require any prior experience, but it does demand unwavering attention to detail, personal accountability, and integrity. Candidates must be comfortable with repetitive work that requires focus, accuracy, and consistency.

Ideal candidates will be reliable, quick learners who take pride in quality work and demonstrate honesty in all aspects of task execution. This role will require strict adherence to provided instructions and procedures, as well as strong communication and daily availability.

Availability Requirements:
-Full-time availability: 40 hours per week
-Training hours (first week): 9AM–5PM Eastern Standard Time (EST)
-Must have a consistent daily schedule with minimal disruptions

Key Responsibilities:
-Follow step-by-step task instructions with a high degree of accuracy
-Validate and verify digital data using company-provided tools
-Consistently meet assigned task targets and productivity metrics
-Report issues, errors, or inconsistencies promptly
-Maintain organized documentation of completed work
-Communicate regularly with supervisors regarding progress, blockers, or clarifications
-Uphold confidentiality and company data policies at all times

Qualifications:
-No specific experience or skillset required – training will be provided
-Must demonstrate extremely high integrity and reliability
-Strong attention to detail and ability to maintain focus over long periods
-Comfortable with repetitive tasks in a remote, structured environment
-Excellent time management and follow-through
-Must be a strong communicator and a responsive teaUpgrade to see actual infomber
-Must have access to a reliable computer, stable internet, and a quiet workspace
-Must be able to follow written English instructions clearly and accurately
When applying, include the subject line “Nifty” so we know you read the full post

Preferred (but not required):
-Previous experience as a Virtual Assistant or Data Entry Clerk
-Familiarity with platforms like Google Sheets and Slack
-Experience working in task-driven, metric-oriented environments

To Apply:
Please submit the following:
-A brief message explaining why you are a great fit for this role
-Your resume or summary of your work experience
-Any relevant experience, even informal or project-based

We’re looking to build a large, dependable team for this project right away. If you're someone who brings consistency, honesty, and dedication to your work, we’re excited to hear from you!
